title.rendered: Historic moment! Sabyasachi becomes 1st Indian designer to walk Met Gala red carpet

content.rendered:
Designer Sabyasachi Mukherjee made his debut at fashion’s biggest event, the Met Gala 2024, which is currently turning heads. While Bollywood actress Alia Bhatt wears Sabyasachi’s 3D creations, the designer also produced hand-picked dresses in the Resort 2024 collection. And that’s not all, Sabyasachi is all glitz and beauty with tourmalines, pearls, emeralds and diamonds from Sabyasachi High jewelry.

Sabyasachi made her Met Gala debut

For her grand fashion debut, renowned designer Mukherjee walked the red carpet in a “woven cotton duster gown from the Sabyasachi Resort 2024 collection” set for a simple look with “studs, pearls, emeralds and diamonds of Sabyasachi High Jewellery” as the creator shared on his Instagram page.

A famous face of the fashion industry, Mukherjee, has become the first Indian fashion designer to walk the coveted Met Gala carpet. She completed her elegant and classy look with a pair of tinted sunglasses and a pair of brown sunglasses. The designer shared a description of his outfit on Instagram. “Like a mechanical shock, refinement and unity are approaching; it’s art, style, and human relations.” Traditions and diversity, which will protect culture from passing away. time.”

Alia in 3D floral print Sabyasachi saree

Meanwhile, actress Alia Bhatt became the talk of the town as she walked the red carpet in a 3D floral sari. For her second look at the fashion event, she opted for a beautiful pastel-colored saree featuring “floral images using silk threads, glass beads and precious stones.”

Read Also: Vicky’s look as Chhatrapati Sambhaji Maharaj in ‘Chhaava’ out.
